Articles.Content: Hi all, in Unity if I set the part tools directory as gamedata, it shows nothing. But if I select an individual mod folder, then it works. Any ideas?

I see that too. Depending on where I set the directory to it will show/not show the path. I find it writes to the correct spot regardless. I would suggest setting it to the directory you want and clicking "Write" - see if it writes to the correct directory.
